findings.title: Iterating over ls output is fragile. Use globs.
findings.description:
Iterating over ls output is fragile. Use globs.

## Additional information

**[2045](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck/wiki/SC2045)**

details.name: Iterating over ls output is fragile. Use globs.
